did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Proposals and reports concerning occupational education.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 27 bound volumes of proposals, and 41 bound volumes of project products and reports originating during James Dunn's tenure at : Cornell Institute for Occupational Education, The American Institutes for Research and the University of Michigan Inter-Professional Research Center for Pupil Personnel Services. In addition there are 21 paperback bound volumes of Career Education materials developed as a comprehensive K-12, Career Education Curriculum for the U.S. Office of Education.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: James A. Dunn Papers #5878. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
